name: Edition 9/22 tarot card - Strength ‡
description:
Size: 2362 x 4725 px

Runnnnn, there's a lion chasing!!! Phew... take it easy. It turned out to be a woman and a lion known as Strength. The woman is a kind and compassionate person, also she handles everything with care. If she appears in front of you, it means she wants to teach you to learn to be a patient, forgiving, and confident person with strong willpower. So, try to face a challenge peacefully, because you have the strength to control your impulses and the animal desires within and you can do that with love.

She is clad in a white dress (represents her purity of spirit and virtue), sitting upon the lion. There is a lemniscate above her head, represents enlightenment, spiritual powers, and her unlimited potential. That infinity sign same as we see in The Magician card. The lion is traditionally a symbol of courage and earthly cravings. Thus, this lion symbolizes the passion and desire that is within it, the power that can be used both constructively and destructively.

Strength ‡ is the 8th card in the Major Arcana. The number 8 refers to authority and balance.

*This item is available only as a Non-Fungible Token (NFT). It’s strictly prohibited to steal and reduplicate this NFT item.

Meaning: Fortitude, magnanimity, nobility, valor, control, influence, compassion
